name: NameAccents
0:
”Alexa, Open Name Accents”
”My Name is Joaquin”
”It is in Spanish language”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: name accents
des: This skill asks for your name and then repeats it in the standard English accent. If the pronunciation sounds off to you, you can ask it to repeat your name in other accents. Currently, the following accents are supported: German, Spanish, French, Hindi, Italian, Japanese and Portuguese.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
